name: 胡憲倫
objective:
永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed
schedule:
Week 1 導論-資本主義與永續發展(綠色資本主義/永續發展目標)
Week 2 永續創新及提昇資源生產力
Week 3 生物模擬－師法自然(Guest Lectured by Ms.  Suphichaya Suppipat)
Week 4 服務與流動的經濟(產品服務系統) 
Week 5 金字塔底層及包容性經濟
Week 6 結語及分組報告
scorePolicy: Homework: 45%    Group Presentation：40%   Class Participation & Discussion 15%
materials:
Lovins, A.B. Lovins, L.H. and P. Hawken, A Roadmap for Natural Capitalism, Harvard Business Review, May-June, 145-158, 1999
Senge et al., The Necessary Revolution- How Individuals and Organizations are Working Together to Create a Sustainable World, The Doubleday Publishing Group, 2008 (齊若蘭譯，Peter Senge原著，必要的革命-個人與組織如何共創永續社會，天下文化，2010)
Papers assigned for the class
